New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded the first game in NBA history with 20+ points, 15+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in under 30 minutes.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic dominated with a triple-double, scoring 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists.
Russell Westbrook contributed 16 points and 11 assists.
Michael Porter and Jamal Murray each scored 21 points.
Trae Young led the Hawks with 30 points and nine assists.
The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter.
The Hawks rallied from a nine-point deficit in the second quarter to lead 62-57 before Denver took a 74-71 lead at halftime.
The Nuggets took control with a dominant third quarter, extending the lead to 84-75 in the first three minutes.
